data.title: Royal Canadian Institute of International Studies (RCIIS)
data.meta_description: Canada’s national English and French language education association representing over 200 private and public accredited programs.
data.text:
RCIIS has very unique teaching philosophy which is “Learning by Doing”. This is a system designed to promote communication by preparing students to converse effectively inside and outside the classroom. Students are encouraged to speak, discuss and share their opinion in all of our classes, so they can become confident while communicating with everyone.

RCIIS has small classes with a family atmosphere. Students feel at home here at RCIIS with the personalized attention that they receive from our professors and our staff members. The campus is spacious and bright with a Café setting in the lobby for students to enjoy their break time and relax when they are not in class. The school is based in a safe and environmentally friendly neighborhood with many amenities nearby.

The Uniqueness of RCIIS:

·Designated Learning Institution in Canada

DLI#:O19440339342

·A member of LANGUAGE CANADA

·Flexible schedule from a few weeks to a year

·High quality of ESL programs

·Highly qualified Canadian teachers

·Very comfortable learning environment

·Friendly staff
